name: Dungeons of Sowold
description:
Dungeons of Sowold

Dungeons of Sowold is a small roguelike with instant deaths and procedurally generated levels. 

To succeed you must find the magic portal. But be careful, danger lurks around every corner.

Keyboard
  • Navigate: WASD or arrow keys
  • Shoot: Spacebar
  • Open doors: E
  • Toggle inventory: Tab
  • Pause: Esc
Important regarding installation

If you are using the Itch.io app while installing, make sure you select the file that matches your OS from the dropdown, whether it's Windows, Linux, Mac.
